title: SMC_NCTokenizer (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK FINAL SMC_NCTokenizer
Reads a CNC program from an
SMC_ITextStream
and converts it into a
SMC_TokenQueue
of
SMC_Token
, which ultimately will be processed by
SMC_NCTokenParser
(which repleaces
SMC_ReadNCTokens
).
Delimiters for tokens of type
string
,
comment
and
variable
can be
reconfigured using the method
SMC_NCTokenizer.SetDelimiters
.

rows:
IfTRUE, the current processing of this function block
is aborted

Stream to read the CNC program from; e.g. might be a file
stream
Report an error in case of syntax error, ifTRUESkips the erroneous token, ifFALSE

rows.Name: bDone
rows.Comment: TRUE: The input stream has been processed completely.

rows:
FALSE: The FB hasnât finished processing the input
stream yet.

TRUE: An error occured.ErrorIDprovides additional
information.

In case of normal operationSMC_Error.SMC_NO_ERROR,
otherwise the ID of the occured error.
Token queue generated from the inputstream
